problem_text: In Fig. 21-26, particle 1 of charge $+1.0 \mu \mathrm{C}$ and particle 2 of charge $-3.0 \mu \mathrm{C}$ are held at separation $L=$ $10.0 \mathrm{~cm}$ on an $x$ axis. If particle 3 of unknown charge $q_3$ is to be located such that the net electrostatic force on it from particles 1 and 2 is zero, what must be the $x$ coordinate of particle $3 ?$
